summary: The diff shows modifications to backend/main.mo and project_state.json, but the content is truncated and the new discipline skills cannot be fully verified. More critically, the frontend SkillsPage.tsx file is not present in the diff at all, meaning REQ-2 appears unimplemented. The project_state.json still lists both AR-1 and AR-2 as 'pending', further suggesting neither requirement was completed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a small batch of discipline skills (no more than 5 at a time) to the backend skill matrix in main.mo, continuing from where the previous batch left off. Each skill should include all required fields (id, name, description, category, stat requirements, level requirement, unlock status defaults).
missing_requirements.reason: The backend/main.mo diff is truncated and no new discipline skill entries with all required fields are visible in the shown content. The project_state.json also marks this as pending.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the frontend SkillsPage.tsx to display the newly added batch of skills, grouped by category and showing unlock status and requirements consistently with existing skill entries.
missing_requirements.reason: The frontend SkillsPage.tsx file is entirely absent from the diff. No frontend changes were made. The project_state.json also marks this as pending.
